QuestData.Title: Rulkan
QuestData.RewardText: Prophet Velen spoke highly of you, and I can see that your weapons are keen and your intent is just.$B$BI sense great potential within you. If you will allow it, I would warm my hands by your fire for a while.$B$BI would like to follow you and learn from your people. In return, I shall fight for you.$B$BWhat do you say, traveler?
